short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change GitHub favicons based on the repository on the link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Favicon Changer helps you easily identify different GitHub repositories by dynamically customizing the favicon for each tab. When working with multiple repositories, tabs can quickly become indistinguishable, leading to confusion and reduced productivity. This extension addresses that problem by giving every repository its own unique favicon.

Why Install It?:

Clear Visual Differentiation: Each GitHub repository tab gets its own unique favicon, which is dynamically generated to display the first three letters of the repository name on a black background. This makes it easier to find the right tab, especially when you have several GitHub tabs open.

Enhanced Productivity: Quickly switch between repositories without wasting time searching through similar-looking tabs.

Lightweight and Seamless: The extension works quietly in the background without any impact on performance or requiring extra permissions beyond GitHub.

No Data Collection: This extension respects your privacy. It doesn't collect, store, or share any data, and only modifies the favicon of GitHub pages.

If you often find yourself juggling multiple GitHub repositories, GitHub Favicon Changer can save you time and keep your browsing organized. Install it now to enjoy a cleaner, more efficient GitHub experience.
